author: Disney
description:
The Movie Surfers are here for another episode, with “Avatar: Fire and Ash.” Dive back into the far-off planet of Pandora for an exclusive, behind-the-scenes look at the third installment of James Cameron’s phenomenally successful “Avatar” franchise. Michelle Khare (@MichelleKhare) chats up the stars of the movie, Bailey Bass (Tsireya), Jack Champion (Miles “Spider” Socorro), and Trinity Jo-Li Bliss (Tuk) about learning to free-dive, doing parkour, and stepping back into Na’vi culture. Oona Chaplin (Varang) will then introduce Movie Surfers to the treacherous “Ash People” who will wreak havoc in the upcoming film. The Surfers also get a crash course in performance capture with Richard Baneham, the movie’s Executive Producer and VFX Supervisor, and stunt performer, Alicia Vela-Bailey. The man behind it all, James Cameron, even stops by to give the Movie Surfers a peek behind the curtain!

Experience “Avatar: Fire and Ash” only in theatres on December 19th, 2025. 

Disney’s “Movie Surfe
title: Movie Surfers | Behind the Scenes of Avatar: Fire & Ash with @MichelleKhare
